comments: If you are a go-getter, please do not take her. You\'ll learn nothing in her class. You\'ll do all the work and feel like you didn\'t need a teacher. Strongly not recommended

She is clueless, and she teaches the class just like that. She is not hard at all, midterm and final plus short group presentation. She comes to class with her hand bag and nothing else, plus she is always twenty minutes late. Not organized, and doesn\'t care to be. easy grader, def recommend her class, just don\'t expect to learn anything.

this teacher has her minor flaws but when it come to grades, she is really lenient. i didnt study for both my mids and the final,still i scored an A.just make sure u attend her classes as everything taught in the class is repeated in her exams.

There were no lectures, simply, class discussions. She had one pet who she dedicated all of her time and attention to, no one else mattered. It is a very difficult subject and she was not at all helpful. She canceled class about 5 times throughout the semester, though I think she might have been pregnant. We were notified that same morning by email
